# <code>agg</code> for lazyframe

<div class='command-title'>Performs a series of aggregations from a group by</div>

## Signature

```> agg ...(Group by expressions)```

## Flags

 * ```-h, --help```: Display this help message
## Parameters

 * ```...Group by expressions <Any>```: Expression(s) that define the aggregations to be applied
## Examples

  Group by and perform an aggregation
```shell
  > [[a b]; [1 2] [1 4] [2 6] [2 4]]
    | into df
    | group-by a
    | agg [
        (col b | min | as "b_min")
        (col b | max | as "b_max")
        (col b | sum | as "b_sum")
     ]
```
  Group by and perform an aggregation
```shell
  > [[a b]; [1 2] [1 4] [2 6] [2 4]]
    | into lazy
    | group-by a
    | agg [
        (col b | min | as "b_min")
        (col b | max | as "b_max")
        (col b | sum | as "b_sum")
     ]
    | collect
```
